original_title: Woman Arrested in Grandpass with ICE, linked to Heroin Cases
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Kudu Nilanthi, a female suspect known by the alias, was apprehended by the Police Special Task Force in Stace Road, Grandpass. The authorities have identified her as an accomplice to a drug lord alias "Stace Road Danushka" in the area.

During the arrest, the police discovered 20.5 grams of ICE in her possession, along with a significant amount of cash believed to be proceedings from drug trafficking. It was revealed that this 44-year-old woman currently faces three pending heroin-related cases in the High Court.
Labour law reforms are brought to suppress people – Dr. Ahilan Kadirgamar
